body:
Add additionally required dependencies to WarpX that are needed for transformations in RZ geometry with spectral (PSATD) solvers.

Also updated CUDA requirement to 9.2+, because earlier versions are too buggy with C++14 and modern libraries.

cc @dpgrote 

Requires https://github.com/ECP-WarpX/WarpX/pull/956 to be merged to mainline before this builds again (otherwise pass `~openpmd` so far).
title: WarpX: RZ + PSATD
